page.title: 04PARISH COUNCIL MEETING
page.content: East Bridgford Parish Council (+P.20) -----------------------------} The Annual Parish Meeting was held on Monday 29 April 1985 in the W.I. hut. 80 members of the public were present. { Chairman's Report }- The Chairman gave his report on things that had concerned the Council in the past year.{Previous Minutes}-These were read & approved.{Village Organisations -Bowls ,Brownies,Bridge Singers, Cricket ,Charities,Drama Group, Cubs, Football ,Friendship , F.O.E.B.S., Guides,Horticultural Society, King Edward Club,Lifeboat Guild,Luncheon Club,Methodist Church, Play Group, Mothers & Toddlers, Red Cross,Sports & Social,St. Peters Church,Tennis, Village Hall, Village Magazine,W.I., W.E.A.,Youth Club, British Legion, Mens Society,Badminton.All these groups presented reports.
